Direct message the job poster from Storm3
Sam Jones
Connecting the best Engineering, DevOps and Security talent with innovative HealthTechs worldwide | Storm3
⚡ SVP of Engineering💸 $250k-$300k🌎 US (Remote) SVP of EngineeringAbout this business.This growing start-up is on a mission to redefine how data transfer works by leveraging peer-to-peer technologies, thus reducing energy consumption, carbon emissions, and freshwater use. We are currently starting a growth phase, and to help us reach our next milestones, we are looking for a head of growth.This SVP of Engineering role will work closely with the CEO, CFO, and CTO to lead, develop and excel the engineering division of the firm.What You’ll Do:As a member of the engineering organization leadership team, you will:Create a technical strategy for ML/AI, Data Science, and Data Eng Create a technical strategy for shared infrastructure and servicesWork with engineering peers, product and business stakeholders to align on the requirements and business needsManage the engineering teams, own the budget for the team, remove roadblocks, own the execution and qualityPartner with your engineering peers and the CTO to solve engineering-wide problemsManage and grow the engineering organization: You will expand, up-level, and manage engineers (people managers and individual contributors), including those embedded on other teamsGive the team clear performance objectives and goals, offer effective feedback and coach them in their ongoing developmentUse the engineering process and tools to make week-to-week execution effective, transparent and predictable. Ensure our process works for us — prioritization, estimates, deadlines, expectation-setting, road mapping, and so onIdentify the open questions in our approach to architecture and technology, and work across engineering to document on an effective approachNurture an evolvable architecture that nimbly supports product and business expansionTake the lead on defining and rolling out several engineering organization processes or practices over courseUnderstand the “buy vs build” tradeoff, and make strategic judgments about where to invest the team’s resources architecturallyWork with senior leadership to get aligned with company-wide goals, and then use this context to prioritize backend initiatives appropriatelyWho You Are:15+ years of professional software engineering experienceStrong organization-building background with a focus on innovation, infrastructure development, and team motivation & buildingDemonstrated track record of recruiting, managing, motivating, and retaining a multi-site global engineering team including contractorsHigh level of executive presence demonstrated by the ability to act as the company’s technical representative to cross-functional leadershipYou have managed teams of 50+ for at least 5 yearsYou have built and operated teams that own shared infrastructure and services utilized by multiple product lines (5+ years on the Director or VP level)You understand how to build architecture and scale it. Proven record of scaling servicesYou have a track record of executionYou are willing to get your hands dirty, it is a start up after allSkills & Qualifications:Growth mindset: receives feedback easily and incorporates it quicklyProactive executor: thoughtful in approach and decisive in decisionsPragmatic: balance scrappiness and rigorAbility to attract, manage and develop strong engineersGreat technical communicatorStrong attention to detailStrong technical architecture and leadershipStrong product and architectural instinctsNice-to-Haves:Healthcare experienceStartup experience⚡
📧 Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button. You can also send your resume directly to samuel.jones@storm3.com or message me directly!
